title: Go CI Pipeline
description:
Run a full featured Go CI pipeline with dependency caching, code formatting and static analysis (gofmt, golangci-lint, staticcheck), security scanning with govulncheck, parallel test execution and JUnit reports via gotestsum, binary artifact compilation, and Docker image packaging.
